entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is a witch who is questioning Harry about his Patronus. She has a booming voice and is described as impressive.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one being questioned by Madam Bones about his Patronus. He is 15 years old and has been producing a Patronus for over a year.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a person who is present at the hearing, but not directly involved in the conversation between Harry and Madam Bones.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is a teacher at Hogwarts who taught Harry how to produce a Patronus. He is mentioned as the reason why Harry was able to do so.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A Patronus is a magical creature that can be produced by wizards and witches to protect themselves from Dementors. It has a clearly defined form, in Harry's case a stag.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are foul creatures that feed on human happiness and can only be repelled by a Patronus. They are mentioned as the reason why Harry needs to produce a Patronus.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school for wizards and witches where Professor Lupin taught Harry how to produce a Patronus. It is mentioned as the place where Harry learned this skill.

relationships.description: Madam Bones is questioning Harry about his Patronus, specifically whether it has a clearly defined form.
Professor Lupin taught Harry how to produce a Patronus at Hogwarts.
